articles.title: Ola Electric posts Rs 200 crore loss in FY21 - Economic Times
articles.description: Ola Electric clocked operational revenue of just Rs 86 lakh as it didnt sell a single product during this period. Its biggest expense was employee benefits, which made up close to 70% of total expenses.

articles.title: Reliance Retail to launch Swadesh to sell products sourced from artisans - Economic Times
articles.description: The company said Swadesh is part of its ‘Handmade in India' programme that is aimed at showcasing authentic handcrafted products and promoting the rich Indian art forms in markets around the world.
articles.content:
Reliance Retail said on Thursday that it will launch a new format called Swadesh that will sell handmade textiles, handicrafts, agriculture items and other products sourced directly from artisans.

articles.title: Some big Indian businesses are joining the exodus from Russia - CNN International
articles.description: Two of India's biggest businesses are moving away from Russia, even as Prime Minister Narendra Modi has refrained from taking a tough stance against Moscow for the war in Ukraine.
